participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and dedicated, Emily is passionate about her work as a school teacher and enjoys spending time in nature.
participant_1.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Resilient and wise, Robert has faced challenges in life but focuses on the joy of family and creativity.
participant_2.background: i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i do not have a smartphone.
